trans-unit.source: Provides a base class that can be used to design value editors that can provide a user interface (UI) for representing and editing the values of objects of the supported data types.
trans-unit.target: 提供可用于设计值编辑器的基类，这些编辑器可提供用户界面 (UI) 以用来表示和编辑所支持的数据类型的对象值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> class provides a base class that you can derive from and extend to implement a custom type editor for the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>类提供一个基类，你可以从派生和扩展来实现的设计时环境的自定义类型编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Typically, your custom type editor interacts with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，你自定义类型的编辑器交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>控件。

trans-unit.source: Custom type editors are useful in situations where a text-box value editor is insufficient to effectively select the values of certain types.
trans-unit.target: 自定义类型的编辑器的一个文本框中的值编辑器不足以有效地选择某些类型的值的情况下有用。

trans-unit.source: To implement a custom design-time UI type editor, you must perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要实现自定义的设计时 UI 类型编辑器，必须执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Define a class that derives from <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个从 <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> 派生的类。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method to handle the user interface, user input processing, and value assignment.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>方法以处理用户界面、 用户输入的处理和赋值。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method to inform the Properties window of the type of editor style that the editor will use.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>方法，以通知的类型的编辑器样式编辑器将使用属性窗口。

trans-unit.source: You can add additional support for painting a value's representation in the Properties window by performing the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加对通过执行以下步骤来绘制属性窗口中的值的表示形式的额外支持：

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetPaintValueSupported%2A> method to indicate that the editor supports displaying the value's representation.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetPaintValueSupported%2A>方法，以指示该编辑器支持显示值的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue%2A> method to implement the display of the value's representation.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue%2A>方法来实现的值的表示形式显示。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> constructor method if the editor should have initialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>构造函数方法如果编辑器应具有初始化行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> class does not support right-to-left (RTL) layouts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>类不支持从右到左 (RTL) 布局。

trans-unit.source: For more information about enhancing design-time support, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2).
trans-unit.target: 有关增强设计时支持的详细信息，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on implementing a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>, see [User Interface Type Editors Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f068b4ea-6e8c-4c0b-aefd-188b337240da).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息实现<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>，请参阅[用户接口类型编辑器概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f068b4ea-6e8c-4c0b-aefd-188b337240da)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates that a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> can be associated with an integer, double, or float property using an <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> to provide an angle selection interface from the Properties window in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>可与整数、 双精度，关联或 float 属性使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>为提供于在设计模式下的属性窗口的角度选择接口。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService> interface to display a drop-down control in the Properties window in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService>接口来在设计模式中的属性窗口中显示的下拉列表控件。

trans-unit.source: Compile the code and add the assembly to the Toolbox using the **Customize Toolbox** command on the **Tools** menu of Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 编译代码并将该程序集添加到工具箱**自定义工具箱**命令**工具**的 Visual Studio 的菜单。

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of the `AngleTestControl` and click the drop-down button next to the Angle property in the Properties window to configure the property using the editor.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例`AngleTestControl`并单击属性窗口使用编辑器将属性配置中的角度属性旁边的下拉列表按钮。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 关联的状态：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle" /> 方法所指示的编辑器样式编辑指定对象的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> that this editor can use to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" />，此编辑器可用它来获取服务。

trans-unit.source: The object to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要编辑的对象。

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle" /> 方法所指示的编辑器样式编辑指定对象的值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的新值。

trans-unit.source: This method launches the user interface for value editing, and is called by the Properties window when a user attempts to edit the value of a type that this editor is configured to edit the value of.
trans-unit.target: 此方法启动用户界面以进行编辑值，并在用户尝试编辑此编辑器配置要编辑的值类型的值，属性窗口时调用。

trans-unit.source: A service provider is provided so that the editor can obtain any required services.
trans-unit.target: 因此，编辑器可以获取任何所需的服务提供服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> that this editor can use to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" />，此编辑器可用它来获取服务。

trans-unit.source: The object to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要编辑的对象。

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified object's value using the editor style indicated by the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle" /> 方法所指示的编辑器样式来编辑指定对象的值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的新值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object it was passed.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未更改对象的值，则它返回的对象应与传递给它的对象相同。

trans-unit.source: A service provider is provided so that the editor can obtain any required services.
trans-unit.target: 因此，编辑器可以获取任何所需的服务提供服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editor style used by the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue(System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取由 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue(System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> 方法使用的编辑器样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editor style used by the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue(System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取由 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue(System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> 方法使用的编辑器样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle" /> enumeration value that indicates the style of editor used by the current <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle" /> 枚举值，该值指示当前 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor" /> 所使用的编辑器样式。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method will return <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 在默认情况下，此方法将返回 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> does not override and implement this method, <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> will return <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None> by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>不重写并实现此方法，<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>将返回<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None>默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editor style used by the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue(System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取由 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue(System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> 方法使用的编辑器样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle" /> value that indicates the style of editor used by the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue(System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle" /> 值，指示 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue(System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> 方法使用的编辑器样式。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor" /> does not support this method, then <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle" /> will return <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor" /> 不支持该方法，则 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle" /> 将返回 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this editor supports painting a representation of an object's value.
trans-unit.target: 指示该编辑器是否支持绘制对象值的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this editor supports painting a representation of an object's value.
trans-unit.target: 指示该编辑器是否支持绘制对象值的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue(System.Object,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> is implemented; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果实现了 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue(System.Object,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified context supports painting a representation of an object's value within the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 指示指定的上下文是否支持在指定的上下文内绘制对象值的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue(System.Object,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> is implemented; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果实现了 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue(System.Object,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether drop-down editors should be resizable by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否应由用户调整下拉编辑器的大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if drop-down editors are resizable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果下拉编辑器是可调整大小的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Paints a representation of the value of an object.
trans-unit.target: 绘制对象值的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" /> that indicates what to paint and where to paint it.
trans-unit.target: 指示绘制内容和绘制位置的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Paints a representation of the value of an object using the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" /> 绘制某个对象的值的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 编辑器应绘制指定矩形的边界内。

trans-unit.source: This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within.
trans-unit.target: 将此矩形指示属性窗口来绘制中值的表示形式的区域。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the rectangle specified by <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A> will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry:
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，由指定的矩形<xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A>将基于时 app.config 文件包含以下条目系统 DPI 设置调整大小：

trans-unit.source: The object whose value this type editor will display.
trans-unit.target: 此类型编辑器将显示其值的对象。

trans-unit.source: A drawing canvas on which to paint the representation of the object's value.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上绘制对象值表示形式的画布。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> within whose boundaries to paint the value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，要在其边界内绘制值。

trans-unit.source: Paints a representation of the value of the specified object to the specified canvas.
trans-unit.target: 将指定对象值表示形式绘制到指定的画布上。

trans-unit.source: Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 编辑器应绘制指定矩形的边界内。

trans-unit.source: This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within.
trans-unit.target: 将此矩形指示属性窗口来绘制中值的表示形式的区域。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the rectangle specified by <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A> will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry:
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，由指定的矩形<xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A>将基于时 app.config 文件包含以下条目系统 DPI 设置调整大小：
